Package Controllers

Class AppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.AppointmentController
  • public class AppointmentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls and populates the appointments view, the edit appointments view, and the add appointments view

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAppointment()
      opens add appointment form scene
      void allAppointments()
      set filter on appointments table to all appointments Includes predicate with lambda to return true for all appointments, so all appointments are shown A lambda was used here because Predicates are one of the perfect use cases for lambdas.
      void close()
      closes scene
      void createAppointment()
      Grabs all values form the appointment form if values are valid, creates a new Appointment record in the database then refreshes appointment data and refreshes allAppointments array Throws alert if something goes wrong, or if the record is invalid
      void deleteAppointment()
      Grabs selected appointment from appointment_table, queries the database to delete the record.
      (package private) static void getAppointments()
      Iterates through customers to grab all Appointment instances Stores Appointment instances in allAppointments observable array
      void initialize()  
      private boolean invalidTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, Customer customer)
      Checks if times for an appointment are invalid or valid
      void modifyAppointment()
      opens edit appointment form scene
      void monthlyAppointments()
      set filter on appointments table to monthly appointments Includes predicate with lambda to return true if the start time for an appointment is after the current moment and within one month A lambda was used here because Predicates are one of the perfect use cases for lambdas.
      private boolean outsideBusinessHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime time)  
      private boolean overlappingWithOtherAppointments​(java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, Customer customer)
      Appointment overlaps if the end time or start time falls inside of a previously existing appointment
      (package private) static void refreshAppointmentData()
      Iterates through customers, calls getCustomerAppointments on each customer This refreshes all customer data by re-querying the database
      private void setFormValues()
      Sets initial form values when editing an appointment Sets choicebox items for customers, contacts, and users
      private void setLocalDefault()
      Sets all text in view to users local default language
      static void setSelectedAppointment​(Appointment appointment)  
      void updateAppointment()
      Grabs all values form the appointment form if values are valid, updates the Appointment record in the database with matching ID from form.
      void weeklyAppointments()
      set filter on appointments table to weekly appointments Includes predicate with lambda to return true if the start time for an appointment is after the current moment and within one week A lambda was used here because Predicates are one of the perfect use cases for lambdas.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

      • setFormValues

        private void setFormValues()
        Sets initial form values when editing an appointment Sets choicebox items for customers, contacts, and users

      • setLocalDefault

        private void setLocalDefault()
        Sets all text in view to users local default language

      • getAppointments

        static void getAppointments()
        Iterates through customers to grab all Appointment instances Stores Appointment instances in allAppointments observable array

      • refreshAppointmentData

        static void refreshAppointmentData()
        Iterates through customers, calls getCustomerAppointments on each customer This refreshes all customer data by re-querying the database

      • createAppointment

        public void createAppointment()
        Grabs all values form the appointment form if values are valid, creates a new Appointment record in the database then refreshes appointment data and refreshes allAppointments array Throws alert if something goes wrong, or if the record is invalid

      • updateAppointment

        public void updateAppointment()
        Grabs all values form the appointment form if values are valid, updates the Appointment record in the database with matching ID from form. Then refreshes appointment data and refreshes allAppointments array Throws alert if something goes wrong, or if the record is invalid

      • deleteAppointment

        public void deleteAppointment()
        Grabs selected appointment from appointment_table, queries the database to delete the record. Throws alert if something goes wrong Throws alert when record is deleted, informing the user that the appointment has been deleted

      • invalidTime

        private boolean invalidTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                            java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                            Customer customer)
        Checks if times for an appointment are invalid or valid
        Parameters:
        start - a LocalDateTime that the user entered as a start time for appointment
        end - a LocalDateTime that the user entered as an end time for appointment
        customer - the customer associated with the appointment that the user is trying to edit or create
        Returns:
        boolean true if the times are invalid, false if the times are valid

      • outsideBusinessHours

        private boolean outsideBusinessHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime time)
        Parameters:
        time - a time that should be within business hours in EST
        Returns:
        boolean true if the time entered is outside business hours in EST, false if time entered is inside business hours in EST

      • overlappingWithOtherAppointments

        private boolean overlappingWithOtherAppointments​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                 java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                                 Customer customer)
        Appointment overlaps if the end time or start time falls inside of a previously existing appointment
        Parameters:
        start - new appointment start time
        end - new appointment end time
        customer - is customer that is associated with the appointment
        Returns:
        boolean true if appointment times overlap with any other appointments that the customer has, false if the appointment does not overlap with other appointments on the customers calendar

      • setSelectedAppointment

        public static void setSelectedAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
        Parameters:
        appointment - the selected appointment in appointment table

      • allAppointments

        public void allAppointments()
        set filter on appointments table to all appointments Includes predicate with lambda to return true for all appointments, so all appointments are shown A lambda was used here because Predicates are one of the perfect use cases for lambdas. They take in values and immediately return a value in a simple block of code

      • monthlyAppointments

        public void monthlyAppointments()
        set filter on appointments table to monthly appointments Includes predicate with lambda to return true if the start time for an appointment is after the current moment and within one month A lambda was used here because Predicates are one of the perfect use cases for lambdas. They take in values and immediately return a value in a simple block of code

      • weeklyAppointments

        public void weeklyAppointments()
        set filter on appointments table to weekly appointments Includes predicate with lambda to return true if the start time for an appointment is after the current moment and within one week A lambda was used here because Predicates are one of the perfect use cases for lambdas. They take in values and immediately return a value in a simple block of code

      • close

        public void close()
        closes scene

      • addAppointment

        public void addAppointment()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        opens add appointment form scene
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong

      • modifyAppointment

        public void modifyAppointment()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        opens edit appointment form scene
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong
